Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Shepsesibptah with hands crossed to hold two hoes in relief, plaited long beard, plain lappet wig, back-pillar and line of hieroglyphs down front with clause from chapter 6 of the Book of the Dead, with identity of deceased on hieroglyphs in single line down back-pillar.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Gideon Algernon Mantell
